overview:
Jeff Caden is a creative tech strategist, designer, inventor, and marketing executive with over 25 years experience in consumer products, building, ecommerce, technology, and non-profit sectors. His ability to solve complex user behaviors and his user-centered approach to product design has led to innovative and iconic user experiences.

He is currently the co-founder and Chief Product Officer of Evergram, the world’s first fully-integrated ‘Future Messaging’ platform, that allows users to time-shift video, audio or text communications through the creation and delivery of future time capsules to friends and family.

As the co-founder of BonDia Labs, Jeff was instrumental in inventing a patent pending, purse portable ,“high fashion” dosage dispensing device that encourages adherence to a Calcium supplement regimen. Prior, Jeff was the CEO of SkyRocket Foods, where he devised a low-fat food product built on his food process patent.

While with the international home builder, Lindal Cedar Homes, Jeff repositioned Lindal’s home designs for the 21st century and oversaw the development of a web enterprise customer acquisition program for hundreds of Lindal resellers around the globe.

In the early 1990’s, as the VP Marketing of Nile Spice Foods, Jeff was instrumental in creating and bringing to market an innovative cup-of soup product and package, spurring a new $250 million grocery category in the U.S.
